name: UAC Bypass Using Consent and Comctl32 - File
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using consent.exe and comctl32.dll (UACMe 22)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(file.path:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\consent.exe.@* AND file.path:*\\comctl32.dll)`
